holidays.title: National Couple's Day
holidays.description: Love is in the air, and it smells sweet with a hint of spice!

holidays.title: National Fajita Day
holidays.description: Nothing better than a juicy cut of skirt steak sizzling over an open flame.

holidays.title: Gold Cup Parade
holidays.description: The Gold Cup Parade proves that when citizens of Charlottetown throw a party, everyone turns out.

holidays.title: Green Man Festival
holidays.description: Grab your keys and let’s head out to Wales’ most vibrant festival — Green Man Festival!

holidays.title: Hawaiian Shirt Day
holidays.description: Take a stroll through beautiful Hawaii and adorn the ‘Aloha’ shirt to commemorate the day.

holidays.title: Indonesia Constitution Day
holidays.description: The heart and soul of the country is the constitution. Unity in diversity is Indonesia’s identity.

holidays.title: Kool Aid Day
holidays.description: Treat yourself and raise your glass of iced Kool-Aid drink to celebrate the day.

holidays.title: Long Tan Day
holidays.description: No, it’s not about getting a good tan under the sun. It’s a solemn remembrance day.

holidays.title: National Angela Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the name ‘Angela’ and the icons in history who go by that name.

holidays.title: National Bad Poetry Day
holidays.description: Roses are red, violets are blue. If Shakespeare can write poetry, so can you!

holidays.title: National Ice Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: Prepare to treat your taste buds to this insanely delicious ice cream pie!

holidays.title: National Jaden Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the name Jaden and the people in history going by this name.

holidays.title: National Mail Order Catalog Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate and learn about the world's oldest and most innovative marketing strategies.

holidays.title: National Men's Grooming Day
holidays.description: Incorporate some style and grooming techniques into your routine this National Men’s Grooming Day.

holidays.title: Never Give Up Day
holidays.description: When the going gets tough, the tough get going. Never give up!

holidays.title: Pinot Noir Day
holidays.description: Grab a wine opener, and enjoy a little refinement this Pinot Noir Day.

holidays.title: Serendipity Day
holidays.description: Let’s dare to be different, try something new, and appreciate the beauty of the moment!

holidays.title: World Breast Cancer Research Day
holidays.description: Hug a loved one and learn a bit more about the ongoing struggle to combat breast cancer.

holidays.title: Edward Norton’s Birthday
holidays.description: A great inspiration to millions of people, Edward Norton is only just getting started!

holidays.title: Emma Langevin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media personality is creating her legacy, one post at a time.

holidays.title: Lauren Pisciotta’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fitness model is creating her legacy, one post at a time.

holidays.title: Louie Castro’s Birthday
holidays.description: This amazing social media star is brimming with confidence! Celebrate his special day here!

holidays.title: Madelaine Petsch’s Birthday
holidays.description: Aside from her acting, she used to be a very talented dancer.

holidays.title: Patrick Swayze’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptional actor and dancer, the world was definitely his stage!
